alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 12:39PM CDT until October 12 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RACINE AND KENOSHA COUNTIES... At 1239 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oak Creek to Union Grove to Channel Lake, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Racine, Mount Pleasant, Pleasant Prairie, Sturtevant, Union Grove, Paddock Lake, Camp Lake, Twin Lakes, Raymond, Yorkville, Silver Lake, Wind Point, Eagle Lake, Caledonia, Salem, Bristol, Paris, Brighton and Somers. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
